space.arim.perms.api

Interface UserManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    space.arim.universal.util.AutoClosable, AutoCloseable, Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Users

    public interface UserManager
extends Configurable
    Maintains the central collection of users.

    Specifications:
    Method implementations must be thread safe.
    getUsers() should return a collection in which changes are automatically reflected.
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a User, overriding potential existing entires.
      @Nullable User getPossibleUser(String id)
      Gets a possible user by id
      User getUser(String id)
      Gets a User by id, creating a new user if the specified user is not tracked.
      Collection<User> getUsers()
      Gets all users tracked.

      • Methods inherited from interface space.arim.perms.api.Configurable

        reload

      • Methods inherited from interface space.arim.universal.util.AutoClosable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        User getUser(String id)
        Gets a User by id, creating a new user if the specified user is not tracked.
        Parameters:
        id - the user's ID
        Returns:
        a user, never null

      • getPossibleUser

        @Nullable User getPossibleUser(String id)
        Gets a possible user by id
        Parameters:
        id - the user id
        Returns:
        the user if the user is tracked, null otherwise

      • addUser

        boolean addUser(User user)
        Adds a User, overriding potential existing entires.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to add
        Returns:
        true if no user existed with User.getId(), false otherwise

      • getUsers

        Collection<User> getUsers()
        Gets all users tracked. The returned Collection automatically reflects changes such as user additions.
        Returns:
        an immutable collection view of all users
